TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ChannelDispatcher extends System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ChannelDispatcherBase

summary.span: 接受通道以及将通道与服务相关联的组件。

span.span: A component that accepts channels and associates them with a service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象将在特定 URI（称为侦听 URI）的 与服务的实例相关联。A object associates an at a particular URI (called a listen URI) with an instance of a service. 每个 对象都可以拥有多个 对象，这多个对象每个都可与该服务的不同侦听器和侦听 URI 相关联。Each object can have many objects, each associated with a different listener and listen URI for that service. 当消息到达时， 会查询每个相关的 对象以确定终结点是否可以接受消息，并将该消息传递到可以接受消息的终结点。When a message arrives, the queries each of the associated objects whether the endpoint can accept the message, and passes the message to the one that can. 当消息的目标地址与 属性相匹配并且消息操作与 属性相匹配时， 对象负责处理来自 的消息。The object is responsible for processing messages from a when the destination address of a message matches the property and the message action matches the property. 控制通道会话的生存期和行为的所有属性都可以在 对象上检查或修改。All properties that control the lifetime and behavior of a channel session are available for inspection or modification on the object. 除了 之外，这些属性还包括自定义 对象、、 以及相关的 。In addition to the , these include custom objects, the , the , the associated and . ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ChannelDispatcher#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_channeldispatcher/cs/service.cs#0)] [!code-vb[S_UE_ChannelDispatcher#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_channeldispatcher/vb/service.vb#0)]

summary.span: 获取 对象的集合，在首次创建通道时您可以使用这些对象来检查通道以及向通道添加状态。

span.span: Gets a set of objects that you can use to inspect and add state to channels when they are first created.

value.span: 类型为 的对象的 。

span.span: A of type objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性可以将自定义通道初始值设定项插入到初始化集合中，以便在首次创建通道时检查和修改通道状态。Use this property to insert a custom channel initializer into the initialization collection to inspect or modify channel state when they are created. 如果与调度程序相关联的协定是双工协定，这也很有用，可以在传出的通道上执行相同的行为。This is also useful to perform the same behavior on outgoing channels if the contract associated with a dispatcher is a duplex contract. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ChannelDispatcher#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_channeldispatcher/cs/snippets.cs#5)] [!code-vb[S_UE_ChannelDispatcher#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_channeldispatcher/vb/snippets.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有当 的实例处于 状态时才可以设置此属性，因为该状态是唯一一个可变且不被释放的状态。This property can only be set when the instance of the is in the state, as this is the only state that is both mutable and not disposed. 如果要防止客户端将 Message ID 和 ReplyTo 寻址标头添加到请求/响应消息，请将 属性设置为 `true`，以便您的应用程序可以控制这些标头。Set the property to `true` if you want to prevent the client from adding Message ID and ReplyTo addressing headers to request/response messages so that your application can control these headers. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ChannelDispatcher#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_channeldispatcher/cs/snippets.cs#12)] [!code-vb[S_UE_ChannelDispatcher#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_channeldispatcher/vb/snippets.vb#12)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果绑定实现 ，Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 将属性的值分配 给此属性。If a binding implements , Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) assigns the value of the property to this property. 因此，如果此值为 `true`，则重写 `false` 的 默认值。So if this value is `true`, the `false` default value of is overridden. 只有当 的实例处于 状态时才可以设置此属性，因为该状态是唯一一个可变且不被释放的状态。This property can only be set when the instance of the is in the state, as this is the only state that is both mutable and not disposed. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ChannelDispatcher#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_channeldispatcher/cs/snippets.cs#14)] [!code-vb[S_UE_ChannelDispatcher#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_channeldispatcher/vb/snippets.vb#14)]
